CITY COUNCIL
ROUNDTABLE/WORKING MEETING
~ FINAL ACTIONS ~
Tuesday, February 8, 2022

5:30 PM

Remote Meeting

The City Council and School Committee hold a joint virtual roundtable to discuss priorities for the
FY23 School Budget.
